TestBoolean_NoRange.description: A test boolean Fact without a configured range.

TestBoolean_WithRange.description: A test boolean Fact that will only accept a session value of True.

TestEnum_NoRange.description: A test enumeration Fact with no range other than its assigned enumerations.

TestEnum_WithRange.description: A test enumeration Fact with an exclusive range of Second to Fifth.

TestFloat_NoRange.description: A test float Fact without any configured range.

TestFloat_WithRange.description: A test float Fact that only stores a session value between the inclusive range of 0.0f and 1.0f.

TestInteger_NoRange.description: A test integer Fact with no configured range.

TestInteger_WithRange.description: A test Integer Fact that will only accept session values between the inclusive range of 0 and 100.
